CPE_ENTRIES.sqlite: DROP TABLE cpe_entries; CREATE TABLE cpe_entries (entry_id INTEGER, cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, cpe_version_suffix VARCHAR(125), term_frequencies TEXT, abs_term_frequency REAL, PRIMARY KEY (entry_id));
CPE_ENTRIES.mariadb: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE cpe_entries (entry_id INTEGER, cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, cpe_version_suffix VARCHAR(125) CHARACTER SET utf8, term_frequencies VARCHAR(600), abs_term_frequency REAL, PRIMARY KEY (entry_id));

CPE_PRODUCT_PREFIXES.sqlite: DROP TABLE cpe_product_prefixes; CREATE TABLE cpe_product_prefixes (cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, cpe_product_prefix VARCHAR(200), PRIMARY KEY (cpe_product_prefix_id));
CPE_PRODUCT_PREFIXES.mariadb: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE cpe_product_prefixes (cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, cpe_product_prefix VARCHAR(200) CHARACTER SET utf8, PRIMARY KEY (cpe_product_prefix_id));

TERMS_TO_ENTRIES.sqlite: DROP TABLE terms_to_entries; CREATE TABLE terms_to_entries (term VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, entry_ids TEXT NOT NULL);
TERMS_TO_ENTRIES.mariadb: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE terms_to_entries (term VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin, entry_ids MEDIUMTEXT CHARACTER SET ascii NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (term));

CPE_PRODUCT_COUNTS.sqlite: DROP TABLE cpe_product_counts; CREATE TABLE cpe_product_counts (cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, count INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (cpe_product_prefix_id));
CPE_PRODUCT_COUNTS.mariadb: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE cpe_product_counts (cpe_product_prefix_id INTEGER, count INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (cpe_product_prefix_id));
